extendedInfo.description: PaintBox uses natural brushes for realistic paintings. Featuring full radius and opacity control, eight levels of undo, with smooth and intuitive touch controls that use speed, pressure, and direction. You will have the ability to create paintings like no other app can offer. Create your art and save it for later or share it with friends using gmail, sms, facebook, etc.Purchase PaintBox Pro for no ad banner.Keywords: drawing, honeycomb, painting, draw, paint, sketch

reviews.title: Got potential.
reviews.comment: Not too bad. Better than most. Sketchbook Mobile is the only real drawing & painting app in the market. So I\'m sticking with it. This is okay but needs a few more updates to make it useable. Also remove distracting ads.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow!!!! Blur brush is actually the best smudge brush !!!
reviews.comment: This program is easy to use and makes it simple to work without having to press a bunch of buttons to get what you need, Blur brush is actually a nice smudge which most apps have yet to get right. Get this one if you want a great art program!!!
reviews.author: Kathleen Browning

reviews.title: promising, needs work
reviews.comment: Nice job on the smooth pressure-sensitivity, but it\'s too laggy to use. Menus could be more compact, bigger color wheel, oil brush opacity seems to go the wrong way..
reviews.author: Jenna Downing

reviews.comment: Nice with the preset brushes, but too slow / edgy lines - HTC desire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Useless.only one brush is working.do not have brushes as shown in image. Slow.not user friendly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: I can\'t even choose! Uninstall. I\'ll try sketchbook mobile as recommended. Maybe android sucks :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice paint app. Real simple and easy to use. Dev is quick to respond.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC ONE V
reviews.comment: this doesn\'t do anything it says its supposed to you\'re supposed to be able to pick out brushes and styles you I use there\'s nowhere you could do that it drives me crazy and I am uninstalling it :-(:-(
reviews.author: Cyndi Sieving

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: I hate this app it is to slow do not get this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Did not work.
reviews.comment: Opened to a screen that showed opacity and brush thickness. Could choose color and brush but I could not draw on canvas. Unusable.
reviews.author: Angela Jackson
